类 AuthController

java.lang.Object
com.financeapp.controller.AuthController
public class AuthController extends Object
Authentication Controller Handles user authentication, registration, and session management

  • 方法详细资料

    • isLoggedIn

      public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Check if a user is currently logged in
      返回:
      true if a user is logged in, false otherwise

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Get the currently logged in user
      返回:
      Current user or null if not logged in

    • register

      public User register(String username, String password, String fullName, String email) throws IOException
      Register a new user
      参数:
      username - Username
      password - Password
      fullName - Full name
      email - Email address
      返回:
      Newly created user
      抛出:
      IOException - if error occurs during user creation

    • login

      public boolean login(String username, String password) throws IOException
      Login with username and password
      参数:
      username - Username
      password - Password
      返回:
      true if login successful, false otherwise
      抛出:
      IOException - if error occurs during user update

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logout the current user

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String currentPassword, String newPassword) throws IOException
      Change password for the current user
      参数:
      currentPassword - Current password
      newPassword - New password
      返回:
      true if password change successful, false otherwise
      抛出:
      IOException - if error occurs during user update

    • updateProfile

      public void updateProfile(String fullName, String email) throws IOException
      Update user profile
      参数:
      fullName - New full name
      email - New email
      抛出:
      IOException - if error occurs during user update
